verbs.description: [ARG0: Frustrated congressional Democrats] [V: accused] [ARG1: the Trump administration] [ARGM-TMP: Friday] [ARG2: of politicizing the 2020 census] [ARGM-TMP: after a Justice Department official declined to answer questions on how the administration came to include a census question asking people about their citizenship status] .

Frustrated congressional Democrats accused [ARG0: the Trump administration] Friday of [V: politicizing] [ARG1: the 2020 census] after a Justice Department official declined to answer questions on how the administration came to include a census question asking people about their citizenship status .

Frustrated congressional Democrats accused the Trump administration Friday of politicizing the 2020 census after [ARG0: a Justice Department official] [V: declined] [ARG1: to answer questions on how the administration came to include a census question asking people about their citizenship status] .

Frustrated congressional Democrats accused the Trump administration Friday of politicizing the 2020 census after [ARG0: a Justice Department official] declined to [V: answer] [ARG1: questions on how the administration came to include a census question asking people about their citizenship status] .
